description: Experience the natural beauty and skiing opportunities at Mount Stožer, a popular winter and hiking destination near Bugojno.
Explore the breathtaking views of Vranica Mountain, perfect for hiking and nature walks in the summer and skiing during the winter season.
Relax by the serene Kupres Lake, ideal for fishing, picnicking, and enjoying a peaceful day surrounded by beautiful nature.
Discover the stunning Prusac Waterfall, a perfect spot for nature lovers and photographers, offering scenic views and a tranquil atmosphere.
Enjoy a day at Raduša Mountain, known for its hiking trails and breathtaking views. Ideal for outdoor enthusiasts and adventurers.
Climb Pločno Peak, the highest point in the Vranica mountain range, offering panoramic views and a challenging hike for adventurers.

funName: Visit to Skakavac Waterfall near Bugojno
description: Marvel at the stunning Skakavac Waterfall near Bugojno. A perfect spot for hiking and nature photography, offering breathtaking views and fresh mountain air.
